description.raw:
I fixed some ABI builds in pull request #834, but ign-physics was still broken. I've made two changes to fix the build and one change to speed it up.

* 1st fix: use c++17 if USE_GCC8 is true. The physics jobs were failing with error logs complaining about c++17 types (see https://gist.github.com/scpeters/5c3dd97591a3f06ab127a2efb9a2ff1a)
* 2nd fix: retry abi checker script with `-quick` if it doesn't generate a report. It seems to run out of memory in the normal mode, but setting `-quick` causes it to "[disable check of some template instances](https://github.com/lvc/abi-compliance-checker/blob/master/abi-compliance-checker.pl#L708-L709)", which appears to be enough to fix the ign-physics build.
* speed thing up by not building the tests

it passed with r2d2: [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_physics-abichecker-any_to_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64&build=83)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_physics-abichecker-any_to_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/83/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_physics-abichecker-any_to_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/83/

but drogon seems to always get disconnected when running this job: [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_physics-abichecker-any_to_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64&build=82)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_physics-abichecker-any_to_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/82/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_physics-abichecker-any_to_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/82/
description.html:
I fixed some ABI builds in pull request #834, but ign-physics was still broken. I've made two changes to fix the build and one change to speed it up.

  • 1st fix: use c++17 if USE_GCC8 is true. The physics jobs were failing with error logs complaining about c++17 types (see https://gist.github.com/scpeters/5c3dd97591a3f06ab127a2efb9a2ff1a)
  • 2nd fix: retry abi checker script with -quick if it doesn't generate a report. It seems to run out of memory in the normal mode, but setting -quick causes it to "disable check of some template instances", which appears to be enough to fix the ign-physics build.
  • speed thing up by not building the tests

it passed with r2d2: https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_physics-abichecker-any_to_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/83/

but drogon seems to always get disconnected when running this job: https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_physics-abichecker-any_to_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/82/

title.raw: Fix and speed up ign-physics ABI builds
